pages.text: The $(item)Reaper Generator$() is perhaps one of the finer things I have discovered. It is capable of draining the life out of nearby creatures, and using that life to produce $(thing)power$(), such as what the $(item)Revitalizer$() device would require.

pages.title: Runes
pages.text: This device can be augmented with $(item)runes$(), and, in fact, requires at least one to function. I have written on runes in a separate entry.
